amendment.description: An amendment numbered 21 printed in House Report 116-42 to require the President to include how the Paris Agreements loss and damage provisions would affect infrastructure resiliency in the United States given the expected impacts of climate change.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kim amendment (A020) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Kim amendment (A020) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A020) offered by Mr. Kim.
